Gain two of the following cantrips: @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.loSfOWaB9bTmb5AJ]{dancing lights}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.LpXH8ce2ZJjeP27x]{elementalism}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.cUNPAfIYP7tiEHo9]{druidcraft}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.e4MmHYtpD4jFrRuH]{light}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.5q8pIqm30Geurdx2]{mage hand}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.xw35KW3YQQkg2Zn4]{mending}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.OXR6Gfomam3qjdnz]{message}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.VAn6kqpftI8yLkit]{minor illusion}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.2Qsc5zwKCaGTcmmg]{prestidigitation}, or @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.vRUeWAv7ZesZ1Tzj]{thaumaturgy}.

Note: You'll need to manually grant your character the spells. This feature is not automated.
